content:
The avatar is at (8, 17). There's a lever to the right (8, 18), one above (7, 17), one to the left(8, 16), and one below (9, 17). I need to pick the lever that will move me towards the goal. I want to move the avatar towards the 'l' which is the passenger, so I should go down to the lever.
Action: 3

The avatar is at (9, 17). The goal is to reach the lever.
The lever is at (8, 16), (7, 17), (8, 18). The avatar is at (9, 17).
So the avatar needs to move up.
Action: 4
I expect to move up to (8, 17).
```Action: 4```

The avatar is at row=8, col=17. There is a lever to the left and right of the avatar.
The target is the lever at (9, 17).
I should move down.
Action: 3
```
Action: 3
```
I'm moving down to the lever to change its state.

The avatar is currently at (9, 17). There is a passenger at (9, 21). To reach the passenger, I need to move right.
Action: 2
I expect the avatar to move towards right.

The avatar is at (9, 17). There is a 'd' lever up at (7, 17). There is a leverLeft '*' at (8, 16) and a leverRight 'b' at (8, 18). There's a passenger 'l' at (9, 21). To reach the levers, I need to move up.
Action: 4
I will move up towards the lever, hoping to reach the levers in the next few steps.

The avatar is at row=8, col=17. There is a lever (d) at row=7, col=17. There's another lever (&) at row=9, col=17. The goal is likely to activate levers. I should move up towards the lever at row=7, col=17.
Action: 4
I will move up to try and activate the lever.

The avatar is at (7,17). There is a lever right at (8,18), and a lever down at (9,17). There are walls surrounding these items. It may be possible to move the avatar to the lever at (8,18) or the lever at (9,17). I should move up towards leverRight 'b' at (8,18), or down towards leverDown '&' at (9,17). Moving up first seems to be a more direct path.
Action: 4

The avatar is at (7, 17). To reach the lever at (9, 17), I need to go down.
```Action:3```
I will move down to approach the lever.

The avatar is at row=8, col=17.
The goal is likely to reach the suitcase '$' at row=5, col=6.
The avatar needs to move up to reach the suitcase.
```Action:4```
I will move up, hoping to get closer to the suitcase.

The avatar is at (7, 17). I need to move towards the lever at (8, 16) or (9, 17).

Action:1
I will move left to try and get to the lever.
